exceptions.exn: In environment p, k, a, b, n, q, r : nat H1 : is_prime p H2 : rel_prime p k H3 : 0 < r H4 : r < n H5 : b <> 0 H6 : power p (q * n + r) * k * power b n = power a n Unable to unify "power p (q * n + r) * k * power b n = power a n" with "power p r * k * power b n = power a n".
